| A mortai:* can [swim](/wiki/Swim "Swim").
* can [survive underwater](/wiki/Amphibious "Amphibious").
* has [no eyes](/wiki/Eyeless "Eyeless").
* has no hands.
* has no limbs.
* has no head.
* is [mindless](/wiki/Mindless "Mindless").
* [does not eat](/wiki/Inediate "Inediate"). (\*)
* is neither male nor female.
* is [strong](/wiki/Strong "Strong").
* [never leaves a corpse](/wiki/Corpseless "Corpseless").
* cannot be [tamed](/wiki/Scroll_of_taming "Scroll of taming"). |                                                                                                                                                           |

**Mortai** are extremely powerful [elementals](/wiki/Elemental "Elemental") that appear in [dNetHack](/wiki/DNetHack "DNetHack").

## Generation

Mortai are usually found on the [Astral Plane](/wiki/Astral_Plane "Astral Plane"), but may also be generated as [minions](/wiki/Minion "Minion") sent to defend neutral altars.

## Strategy

They will only take 1/16 damage from weapon attacks, so they're best avoided if possible. [Conflict](/wiki/Conflict "Conflict") can be useful.

- *This page is a **[stub](/wiki/Category:Stubs "Category:Stubs")**. Should you wish to do so, you can contribute by [**expanding this page**.](https://nethackwiki.com/index.php?title=Mortai\&action=edit)*

html:
Mortai

From NetHackWiki
Jump to navigation Jump to search
E Mortai (No tile)
Difficulty 10
Attacks Engulf 5d10 physical, claw 5d10 wet, elemental spellcasting 10d10
E Mortai (No tile)
Difficulty 10
Attacks

Engulf 5d10 physical, claw 5d10 wet, elemental spellcasting 10d10

Base level 20
Base experience 291
Speed 24
Base AC −10
Base MR 125
Alignment 0 (neutral)
Frequency (by normal means) 0 (Not randomly generated)
Genocidable No
Weight 2500
Nutritional value 0
Size huge
Resistances poison, petrification, magic, weapon attacks

A mortai:

  • can swim.
  • can survive underwater.
  • has no eyes.
  • has no hands.
  • has no limbs.
  • has no head.
  • is mindless.
  • does not eat. (*)
  • is neither male nor female.
  • is strong.
  • never leaves a corpse.
  • cannot be tamed.

Mortai are extremely powerful elementals that appear in dNetHack.

Generation

Mortai are usually found on the Astral Plane, but may also be generated as minions sent to defend neutral altars.

Strategy

They will only take 1/16 damage from weapon attacks, so they're best avoided if possible. Conflict can be useful.

This page is a stub. Should you wish to do so, you can contribute by expanding this page.
Retrieved from "https://nethackwiki.com/index.php?title=Mortai&oldid=138157"

'''Mortai''' are extremely powerful [[elemental]]s that appear in [[dNetHack]].

==Generation==
Mortai are usually found on the [[Astral Plane]], but may also be generated as [[minion]]s sent to defend neutral altars.

==Strategy==
They will only take 1/16 damage from weapon attacks, so they're best avoided if possible. [[Conflict]] can be useful.
